column3: Latest;Kandal: At around 3.30 pm on March 12
column5: a murder occurred after around 5 suspects riding three motorbikes armed with swords

column10: a 38-year-old man who sold goods. Other reports suggest that the victim and the suspect were involved with drugs.------Police are investigating and will take action against all responsible. ------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/294482
